body_html: @yuefengz I have simplified the unit test and add test case when num gpus > 1. It works with AggregatingVariable with VariableAggregation.SUM. And I have merge the code with the latest version. Are you able to import this now?
body_text: @yuefengz I have simplified the unit test and add test case when num gpus > 1.  It works with AggregatingVariable with VariableAggregation.SUM.  And I have merge the code with the latest version. Are you able to import this now?
body: @yuefengz I have simplified the unit test and add test case when num gpus > 1.  It works with `AggregatingVariable` with `VariableAggregation.SUM`.  And I have merge the code with the latest version. Are you able to import this now?
